PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Mask out the bit that is ignored in the initator ID

PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Mask out the bit that is ignored in the responder ID

PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option to set the operator applied to the filters

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sample Window Size
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Sample Window Size in clock cycles

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option to enable module permanently, or between external input start and stop trigger, or application

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Export Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of sending counter value at the expiration of sample window, or by software requst

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Dump Mode
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of set a condition for sending out counter value

PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of the condition to export counter values

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Up Counter Range
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Up limit of the counter value range

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Low Counter Range
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Low limit of the counter value range

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Enable Address Range Limit
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option to trace in the defined address range for the transaction
